name: Nise-Chan & The Box of Souls
description:
Nise-chan & The Box of Souls is an RPG about a girl named Masami and her quest to defeat the Demon Lord that is causing problems. Along the way she uses the Box of Souls to make monster allies.

*Features Side View Battles!
*Over 50 Monsters!
*See the first game in the Negative Zero lineup!
